content.text:
# List of chairmen of the Presidium of the Supreme Soviet of the Estonian Soviet Socialist Republic__disambig_1

The chairman of the Presidium of the Supreme Soviet of the Estonian Soviet Socialist Republic was the highest official in the Estonian Soviet Socialist Republic, which was in turn a part of the Soviet Union.
Below is a list of office-holders:
{| class="wikitable"
! Image
! Name
! Entered office
! Left office
|-
|
|Johannes Vares(1890–1946)
|August 25, 1940
|November 29, 1946
|-

|November 29, 1946
|March 5, 1947
|-
|
|Eduard Päll(1903–1989)
|March 5, 1947
|July 4, 1950
|-
|
|August Jakobson(1904–1963)
|July 4, 1950
|February 4, 1958
|-

|-

|-
|

|December 22, 1970
|-
|
|Artur Vader(1920–1978)
